allow: Bash(if not exist logs mkdir logs)

Bash(git commit -m "Initial commit - Qunex Trade v1.0

- AI-powered penny stock prediction platform
- ROC-AUC: 0.9789, 70%+ success rate
- Ensemble ML models (XGBoost, LightGBM, RF, GB)
- Flask web dashboard with modern UI
- Automatic signal generation at 4:05 PM daily
- Weekend and holiday handling
- Git LFS for model files
- Auto-training on deployment")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix: Update Python dependencies for compatibility

- Change Python version to 3.11.0 (stable)
- Update pandas to >=2.2.0 for Python 3.13 compatibility
- Update numpy to >=1.26.0
- Fix gunicorn installation issue")
